bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with the appearance of lice all over the body after one has gone to bed, and with itching and pain. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi yan 食鹽 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 虱出怪病：每至 臨臥 , 渾身虱出約及五升 , 隨手血肉俱壞 , 每宿漸多 , 癢痛不可名狀 , 惟吃水 臥坐床上 , 晝夜號哭 , 舌尖血出不止 , 牙齒俱黑 , 唇動鼻開 , “ Queer disease of lice appearance . Each time one goes to bed lice appear, all over the body, as many as would fill 5 sheng . Blood and flesh decay immediately. This increases every night. The itching and pain are undescribable. All one consumes is water, and one sleeps sitting on the bed, wailing day and night. The tip of the tongue bleeds unendingly. The teeth are all black. The lips move and the nose opens”.
